title: Second Shot at Love
overview: A story about a woman who was born and raised in a family of alcoholics escaping from her drunkenness.Â Han Geum Joo is a mechanic who becomes a public servant at a large company because she loves cars. She was called a "woman who drinks better than men," but when she is given another title of "alcoholic," Geum Joo decides to challenge herself by "abstaining from drinking." Seo Ui Joon is a doctor who was on a roll as a specialist at a prestigious university hospital in Seoul but ended up moving down to the rural village of Bocheon Health Center. He believes that alcohol is not a cure but an anesthetic and can ruin your life, and he will likely get involved with Geum Joo, who has been given the title of "alcoholic".
